languages.text: "В первую очередь вам следует с уважением относиться к официальным представителям Империума — пусть Простор и окраина, он все же относится к территории {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Появление {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} привело к тому, что Простор Коронус стал менее диким и неконтролируемым регионом... к вящему расстройству некоторых индивидов, привыкших к местному беспределу".

traits.locale_text: "В первую очередь вам следует с уважением относиться к официальным представителям Империума — пусть Простор и окраина, он все же относится к территории {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Появление {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} привело к тому, что Простор Коронус стал менее диким и неконтролируемым регионом... к вящему расстройству некоторых индивидов, привыкших к местному беспределу".

languages.text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."
languages.original_text: "В первую очередь вам следует с уважением относиться к официальным представителям Империума — пусть Простор и окраина, он все же относится к территории {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Появление {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Лорд-инквизитора{/g} привело к тому, что Простор Коронус стал менее диким и неконтролируемым регионом... к вящему расстройству некоторых индивидов, привыкших к местному беспределу".

traits.locale_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it is still considered the territory of the Golden Throne. The arrival of the Lord Inquisitor has turned the Koronus into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some of your fellows."

"In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it is still considered the territory of the Golden Throne. The arrival of the Lord Inquisitor has turned the Koronus into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who got used to the lack of enforced laws."

"In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it is still considered the territory of the Golden Throne. The arrival of the Lord Inquisitor has turned the Koronus into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some of your fellows."

The arrival of the Lord Inquisitor has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

"In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

languages.text: “首先，您应当尊重帝国的官方代表。或许科罗努斯扩区确实处于边缘地带，但它依然是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的领土。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}大审判官{/g}的到来让科罗努斯扩区得到了管束，不再像原来那样无法无天……某些已经习惯于胡作非为的住民，会感到新的律法难以接受。”
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: “首先，您应当尊重帝国的官方代表。或许科罗努斯扩区确实处于边缘地带，但它依然是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的领土。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判长{/g}的到来让科罗努斯扩区得到了管束，不再像原来那样无法无天……某些已经习惯于胡作非为的住民，会感到新的律法难以接受。”

languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the Golden Throne. The arrival of the Lord Inquisitor has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

languages.text: «En primera instancia, trate a los representantes oficiales del Imperium con respeto. Por muy alejada que esté la Extensión de Koronus, sigue siendo uno de los territorios del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. La llegada del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g} ha hecho que la Extensión de Koronus sea mucho menos salvaje y descontrolada... muy a pesar de algunos individuos acostumbrados a la anarquía local».
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: «En primera instancia, trate a los representantes oficiales del Imperium con respeto. Por muy alejada que esté la Extensión de Koronus, sigue siendo uno de los territorios del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. La llegada del {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisidor{/g} ha hecho que la Extensión de Koronus sea mucho menos salvaje y descontrolada... muy a pesar de algunos individuos acostumbrados a la anarquía local».

languages.text: 「まず第一に、帝国の公式な代表者には敬意をもって接するべきです。エクスパンスは辺境ではありますが、それでも{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の領土の1つなのです。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の到着により、コロヌス・エクスパンスの騒乱は多少の落ち着きを見せました。それでも無秩序な地域ではありますが…このことは、現地の無法さに慣れ親しんでいた人々にとっては悔やまれることのようです」
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: 「まず第一に、帝国の公式な代表者には敬意をもって接するべきです。エクスパンスは辺境ではありますが、それでも{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の領土の1つなのです。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}ロード・インクィジター{/g}の到着により、コロヌス・エクスパンスの騒乱は多少の落ち着きを見せました。それでも無秩序な地域ではありますが…このことは、現地の無法さに慣れ親しんでいた人々にとっては悔やまれることのようです」

languages.text: "Zuerst einmal solltet Ihr offizielle Vertreter des Imperiums mit Respekt behandeln — die Ausdehnung mag am Rand liegen, doch sie zählt dennoch zu den Territorien {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}des Goldenen Throns{/g}. Die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} hat die Koronus-Ausdehnung weniger wild und unkontrolliert gemacht ... sehr zum Bedauern einiger Personen, die sich mit der Gesetzlosigkeit arrangiert hatten."
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: "Zuerst einmal solltet Ihr offizielle Vertreter des Imperiums mit Respekt behandeln — die Ausdehnung mag am Rand liegen, doch sie zählt dennoch zu den Territorien {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}des Goldenen Throns{/g}. Die Ankunft des {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Großinquisitors{/g} hat die Koronus-Ausdehnung weniger wild und unkontrolliert gemacht ... sehr zum Bedauern einiger Personen, die sich mit der Gesetzlosigkeit arrangiert hatten."

languages.text: « Tout d'abord, vous devriez faire preuve de respect envers les représentants officiels de l'Imperium. Même si les Étendues se trouvent à la frontière, elles font partie des territoires du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Le secteur est devenu moins sauvage et plus civil depuis l'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}... au grand regret de certains individus qui s'étaient habitués à l'anarchie des lieux. »
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: « Tout d'abord, vous devriez faire preuve de respect envers les représentants officiels de l'Imperium. Même si les Étendues se trouvent à la frontière, elles font partie des territoires du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Le secteur est devenu moins sauvage et plus civil depuis l'arrivée du {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}seigneur inquisiteur{/g}... au grand regret de certains individus qui s'étaient habitués à l'anarchie des lieux. »

languages.text: "İlk olarak İmparatorluk'un resmî temsilcilerine saygı göstermelisiniz. Enginlik, en uç bölgelerden biri olsa da nihayetinde {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} toprağıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun{/g} gelişiyle Koronus Enginliği daha sakin ve kontrol edilebilir bir bölge oldu... Bölgenin kuralsızlığına alışagelmiş bazı kimseler ise bu durumdan hayli rahatsız."
languages.original_text: "In the first instance, you should treat official representatives of the Imperium with respect — the Expanse may be on the fringes, but it still numbers among the territories of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. The arrival of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Inquisitor{/g} has turned the Koronus Expanse into a less wild and uncontrolled region... to the regret of some individuals who had grown inured to the local lawlessness."

traits.locale_text: "İlk olarak İmparatorluk'un resmî temsilcilerine saygı göstermelisiniz. Enginlik, en uç bölgelerden biri olsa da nihayetinde {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} toprağıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Lord Engizisyoncu{/g}'nun gelişiyle Koronus Enginliği daha sakin ve kontrol edilebilir bir bölge oldu... Bölgenin kuralsızlığına alışagelmiş bazı kimseler ise bu durumdan hayli rahatsız."
